name: DEFENDER BIR
description:
Story:Our here Bir is on a mission to save our planet from invaders. Shoot them down before they destroy you.

Left Click/spacebar to shoot and direction keys/WASD to move.

The game is still in development. A boss, score and some health bar for enemy/player is intended to be added later.

Note: Some issue with screen size right now. Will fix it later in next update.

Level 1 Music Credit: https://www.jperezmusic.com/video-game
